Explain the cause-and-effect relationship between the question and your chosen answer.
rationale: 10. The correct answer is **(E) stapler**. A stapler is a device that fastens two or more pieces of paper together with a metal staple. Glue is a substance that sticks things together by forming a bond. Therefore, a stapler is a tool that can be used to attach two pieces of paper without using glue because it is a way of joining paper by piercing and bending metal.
